resources.string: Records Video, IMU and Camera Meta Data to this location:\n %s
Optical Image Stabilization (OIS) is enabled, you need to compensate for this with the OIS sample data during 3D reconstruction.
Optical Image Stabilization (OIS) is enabled but OIS data is not stored, which means that the saved camera parameters are not valid. Please enable OIS data in settings.
Digital Video Stabilization is enabled, the stored camera parameters will not be correct.
This app requires permission to use the camera.\n\nIt will be useless otherwise.
Distrotion Correction enabled, distortion parameters are invalid.
